concept.title: Destinations
concept.shortdesc: A destination stage represents the target for a pipeline. You can use one or more destinations in a pipeline.

conbody.p:
destinationsoverviewYou can use the following types of destinations in a pipeline:
Elasticsearch - Writes data to an Elasticsearch cluster.
Hadoop FS - Writes data to a file system on Hadoop.
HBase - Writes data to an HBase cluster.
Kafka Producer - Writes data to a Kakfa cluster.
Error - Passes records to the pipeline for error handling.
Solr - Writes data to a Solr node or cluster.
Trash - Removes records from the pipeline.
